nationality.content:

3. Bill Vogel: He is described as a "wine distributor from New Rochelle." New Rochelle is a city in the state of New York in the United States. Therefore, we can infer that Bill Vogel is an American.
4. Will Shortz: He is described as the crossword puzzle editor of The New York Times. The New York Times is an American newspaper. Therefore, we can infer that Will Shortz is an American.

| Person            | Nationality | Whether the Person has the Nationality |
